content: too this trick tight narrowing the wingspan of the shawlette at the beginning of each row knit the first section two includes a row of eyelets and a stitch slip it back to the left needle knit the leafy edging finishing with a few row of garter first stitch again and then continue with stitch section two has a 3-stitch garter border the rest of the row as usual on each side one slipped stitch for a neat edge followed by two garter stitches this border is also as discussed above be sure not to work a included in both the written and charted slipped-stitch edge in section one because this instructions will tighten the top edge 2 instructions alternate written instructions section one for ka ana chart cast on 6 stitches with knitted cast on row 1 set-up k2 yo k2 yo k2 8 sts row 1 rs slip wyif k2 k2 m1 k9 23 row 2 set-up k2 yo k1 tbl yo k2 k1 tbl times k2 m1 k5 24 sts increased = 287 yo k2 3 sts increased = 11 sts sts row 2 slip wyif k2 purl to 3 sts before row 3 k2 yo k1 tbl yo knit to 5 sts before end k3 end k1 tbl k1 k1 tbl yo k2 3 sts increased row 3 slip wyif knit across row 4 slip wyif knit across repeat row 3 83 times more until you have row 5 slip wyif k2 k2tog yo to 4 sts 263 stitches on the needles there is no right or before end k4 wrong side to the shawlette at this point what row 6 slip wyif knit across matters is the number of stitches on the needles row 7 slip wyif knit across row 8 slip wyif k2 purl to 3 sts before note the size can be adjusted by working end k3 fewer or more row in multiples of 11 this will row 9 slip wyif knit across adjust the stitch count by multiples of 33 for row 10 slip wyif knit across example for one size smaller repeat row 3 72 row 11 slip wyif k2 p2 k1 tbl p2 k7 times more until you have 230 stitches on the 23 times p2 k1 tbl p2 k3 needles for one size two sizes three sizes row 12 slip wyif k4 p1 k2 p7 k2 p1 larger repeat row 3 94 105 116 times more k2 23 times k3 until you have 296 329 362 stitches on the row 13 slip wyif k2 p2 k1 tbl p2 k7 needles 23 times p2 k1 tbl p2 k3 row 14 slip wyif k4 p1 k2 p7 k2 p1 row 4 set-up slip wyif k1 k1 tbl knit to 5 k2 23 times k3 sts before end k1 tbl k1 k1 tbl k2 row 15 slip wyif k2 p1 p1 yo k1 yo p2 ssk k3 k2tog p1 23 times p1 yo k1 section two yo p2 k3 2 sts increased
